monitoring_scripts.calculate_agent_cost.py:
#!/usr/bin/env python3
import sys
import json

agent_name = sys.argv[1]
duration = float(sys.argv[2])
model = sys.argv[3]

# Cost calculation based on model and duration
rates = {
    'sonnet': 0.003,  # per second
    'opus': 0.015     # per second
}

cost = duration * rates.get(model, 0.003)
print(f'Agent: {agent_name}, Cost: ${cost:.4f}')

# Log to cost tracking
with open('.claude/cost_tracking.json', 'a') as f:
    json.dump({
        'agent': agent_name,
        'model': model,
        'duration': duration,
        'cost': cost
    }, f)
    f.write('\n')
